about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hello, I'm Yutung Yang , graduated from Philosophy Department at Fu Jen Catholic University. I am possesses open-mindedness, strong communication skills, and resilience. During my university years, I helped many teams solve problems related to collaboration. Through my work, I came to realize that the quality of UI and UX design could greatly impact efficiency, which sparked my interest in web design. This led me to participate in a six-month professional training program to further my development of technical skills.
about.p2: During my training, I learned how to use HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to build responsive web pages. I also gained experience in developing JavaScript interactive functions, integrating API data to create LineBot applications, and utilizing Vue.js along with Node.js and MongoDB databases to independently build a website with both front-end and back-end functions. These experiences have given me a great sense of achievement in problem-solving and technical improvement, and have fostered my aspiration to become a professional and active front-end designer, or even a full-stack engineer.
about.p3: In my work, I always strive to complete each task to the best of my abilities. When faced with difficulties, I try to identify the root of the problem and offer potential solutions. I believe that my skills and experiences can add value to company.

items.school: Ministry of Labor - Program for Web Development (Taishan)
items.desc: Completed 936 hours of employment training and acquired the skills for web development,
items.details: Applications of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Website building using Bootstrap, jQuery, Vue.js, Node.js, Quasar UI, and MongoDB Integration of data through RESTful API and project management using Git version control

tasks: 1. Hardware Diagnosis and Maintenance: Responsible for hardware fault diagnosis, repair, and quality inspection. Located hardware defects through precise failure analysis to improve equipment uptime and ensure operational availability.
2. Technical Support and Business Development: Collaborated with the BD team to provide software/hardware integration solutions and managed client-side PoC (Proof of Concept) verification.

3. Hardware Quality Verification: Led stress testing and environmental simulation for hardware equipment, ensuring product specifications met market demands, and authored data-driven analysis reports to support business promotion.

4. eCare System Development and Operation Support: Participated in architectural changes and functional testing of the eCare customer service system, optimizing UI/UX and fixing bugs based on consumer feedback.

5. Cross-Departmental Requirement Translation: Translated technical pain points from customer feedback into development requirements, optimizing product usability and stability to significantly improve customer satisfaction.
2. Bento shop POS system and ERP system.

items.company: Ching Sheng Pharmacy | Chan Yi-Chih ENT Clinic
tasks: 1. Handle HIS data processing tasks and verify identities and documents.
2. Maintain, update, and manage document files and database systems (Visual FoxPro).
3. Keep the environment clean and replenish supplies.
